product.title: LEONARDO Bear
product.product_body: Leonardo, designed for small children, will protect them and be with them until they weigh 18kg. As newborns, it will protect them by keeping them in a comfortable rearwardfacing position. As they grow up, it will cuddle the baby with its 6 comfortable positions from sitting to sleeping. The exclusive technology of the harness tensioner on both sides allows to fasten the child seat in an incredibly safe manner.

product.title: Roof Box Menabo : DIAMOND 500 WHITE
product.product_body: Roof box functional for any need, characterized by a quick and safe Quick Fixing System. It can be installed on any roof bar.It is safe and provided with an external anti-theft lock.

product.product_body:
Travel Bag with a capacity of 95 lt
Suitable for optimize the space in the Menabo's roof boxes .
Color : black / red

product.title: MIKI PLUS FIX Bear
product.product_body:
Miki Plus protects older children by offering the safety of the anatomical backrest and soft headrest, which protects them from lateral impacts. The belt guides integrated in the child seat bring the seat belt closer to the child, who can start to fasten it on his own, learning the basic principles of safety in the car.
The Mixi Fix model features two Isofix connectors that secure the child seat to the frame of the vehicle.

product.title: PICK-UP
product.product_body: Elegant, light roof bar designed for cars with built-in railings. Complete with integrated safety system and easily fitted mounting system. Available in different lengths.

product.title: WI-BOX
product.product_body: Bike carrier with box included. Simple, practical and easy to mount. Designed to carry two bikes or a box. Quickly changes from bike carrier to box carrier.

product.title: PICCOLO
product.product_body: Pratical reductor for car seats. It can fit model included in group 1/2/3. Soft, ergonomic booster cushioning for newborns in breathable hypoallergenic material. Provides maximum comfort on long journeys or during a nap.

product.title: SILVER ICE
product.product_body: Aluminium ski carrier for roof bars, suitable for carrying 6 pairs of skis or 4 snowboards. Provided with anti-theft system both for skis and ski carrier itself which improves cargo safety. Extreme facility of load thanks to the sliding base. Possibility of fixing using T-Screws provided .

product.title: GIO PLUS Shining Pink
product.product_body: Gio Plus is the ideal travel mate for your children. It can be used from when they are 9 months to 12 years old (from 9kg to 36kg). With the adjustment mechanism for the headrest, which locks automatically at the desired height, it is easier to find the most comfortable position for your child.

product.title: B-BIP RED
product.product_body: Pedagogy toys by Bellelli. This pedal-free running bike is ideal for fulfilling your child's desire to be active and independent. By using the B-Bip running bike the child will stimulate and develop his sense of balance, with dexterity and ease. The transition to real bicycle will then be smooth and easy: thanks to a mastered balance, the training wheels will no longer be necessary.
